refnamediv.refpurpose: Sends MIDI information to a VST plugin.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: vstmidiout instance, kstatus, kchan, kdata1, kdata2

refsect1.note: These opcodes have been withdrawn due to licencing/copyright issues as from Csound 6.12

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: vstmidiout is used for sending MIDI information to a VST plugin.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: instance - the number which identifies the plugin, to be passed to other vst4cs opcodes.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kstatus - the type of midi message to be sent. Currently noteon (144), note off (128), Control Change (176), Program change (192), Aftertouch (208) and Pitch Bend (224) are supported.
kchan - the MIDI channel transmitted on.
kdata1, kdata2 - the MIDI data pair, which varies depending on kstatus. e.g. note/velocity for note on and note off, Controller number/value for control change.
